DOC.HEAD: Current Quotations
DOC.TEXT: ``The United States only gives us bullets.'' _ Dr. Elmer Miranda, deputy director of Santo Tomas Hospital in Panama City, criticizing the United States for failing to send more food and medical supplies during its invasion of Panama.

``We will establish a new structure of political power. The old structure of party and government was liquidated.'' _ Ion Iliescu, a former Central Committee secretary, announcing the formation of a ``National Salvation Front'' in Romania.

``There was supposed to be global warming, but I don't think anybody's seen it this month.'' _ National Weather Service forecaster Edward Yandrich in New York City, where temperatures plunged into the single digits.
